complaints.summary: Legal translation engine fails to compile due to blank template strings
complaints.details: Running eslint and tsc shows src/lib/legal-translation/LegalTranslationEngine.ts has placeholder strings missing interpolations (e.g. message: "" may not have direct equivalent in ,"), so the parser stops with ',' expected. This breaks legal translation flows that import translateLegalText and prevents typecheck from finishing.
complaints.next_action: Restore the missing string interpolations/placeholders in LegalTranslationEngine so the module parses and legal translation routes compile; rerun lint and tsc to confirm.

history.note: Complaint logged by Complaints pod; see ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0003/lint-log.txt for eslint failure and ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0003/typecheck-log.txt for tsc errors.
